mapper.update: update auth_platform set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, del_status = #{delStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, code, url, business_id, enable, del_status, created_time, updated_time from auth_platform
